WorkItem.Description:
When I try to equip items from the item list on the right, it doesn't equip it - but adds the stats for the item. 
 
What I did - messing around with my neck piece:
In the list on the right I left-clicked an item 
Selected "Equip"
My stats summery updated - but the item / icon on the char screen didn't. 
 
However if I left-click the item / icon on the char screen - on the left - it all seem to work as it should.
 
With this "I can equip" the same item two times. First use the "right hand side" to add the stats and then use the "left hand side" to add the item and the stats again.

Comments.Message: I had the same problem. I left clicked an item in the right pane, selected equip, but the item in the left pane did not show as the newly equiped item.
